articles.author: Jez Corden
articles.title: 3 reasons why AIs like Microsoft Copilot and ChatGPT will only get worse — and why it doesn't have to be this way - Windows Central
articles.description: These are the biggest threats facing large language models like OpenAI ChatGPT, Microsoft Copilot, and Google Bard.
articles.content:
AI — it's everywhere you look right now. 
Every day it feels like there's a fresh news story about AI, whether it's a new technological breakthrough, a new company getting in on the action, or an AI… [+12298 chars]
